description: Character AI is an AI-powered character creation tool that allows writers and game developers to quickly and easily generate realistic, customizable characters for their stories and games.

input_output_examples.input: Create a male protagonist with brown hair and blue eyes.
input_output_examples.output: Here's your male protagonist with brown hair and blue eyes. His name is Jack, he's 28 years old, and he's a former marine who now works as a private investigator.

input_output_examples.input: Generate a female character with green hair and a punk style.
input_output_examples.output: Here's your female character with green hair and a punk style. Her name is Skylar, she's 20 years old, and she's a rebellious college student who's always pushing the boundaries.

1.description: Character AI allows users to customize a wide range of attributes, including gender, age, appearance, personality, and backstory.

2.description: Character AI uses advanced AI algorithms to generate realistic, believable characters that are tailored to the user's specifications.

3.description: Character AI can be integrated with popular game engines like Unity and Unreal Engine, allowing game developers to easily import characters into their games.

use_cases.name: Game development
use_cases.description: Character AI can be used to quickly generate a variety of characters for use in video games, saving developers time and effort.

use_cases.name: Story writing
use_cases.description: Character AI can be used by writers to create characters for their stories, helping them to flesh out their characters and make them more realistic and engaging.

accuracy.description: Character AI generates realistic characters with a high degree of accuracy.
